subject: [General] New message from Sam Hayes
description_text:
Hey guys, I’ve ordered pedals via Alixpress. I already have your wheel button box in which I actually designed a GT style wheel for.

 Happy to work with you to sell these on your site. Going to make videos on your products and get people to use my code! If there is any more work we can do together I’m happy to do it. 

--
Sam Hayes 
hayes.sam00@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Hayes,  Could you please share some screenshots of your design? If we find it appealing, we may consider listing your product and offering you a commission based on the order volume.    Moreover, our official website already has a well-established commission program, and many people have successfully earned commissions through referrals.

Hi there,

I will show you what I made! It helps it make the Logitech much better too.
But can go on any base with a 70mm PCD. Here is a picture, it is 3D printed
from Carbon fibre PLA

Also if we can set up a code before I do my video I’ll put it in the video.
Hopefully my pedals will come soon. Photo attached


On Sun, 27 Jul 2025 at 03:06, service@simsonn.com
Hi Sam Hayes,  It looks really nice!

Do you want to work together on this?

Regards
Sam

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025 at 13:30, service@simsonn.com
Hi Sam Hayes,  but is your handle 3D printed? The result may not be optimal. Have you considered molded silicone instead?

Handle is 3D printed yes, I do want to do molded silicone yes but don’t
have the facilities personally to make a mould for it. Which is why I’d be
willing to work with a big company like yourselves.

I do have over 50 hours of play time on this setup with no issues.

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025 at 13:41, service@simsonn.com
Hi Sam Hayes,    I will evaluate the mold cost with the product team tomorrow.

Awesome!

I’d be willing to work for Simsonn as an independent designer also

Regards
Sam

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025 at 14:22, service@simsonn.com

Hi guys,

I made my review on YouTube of the pedals :) I saw you have a drive hub in
development when will this be finished?

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025 at 14:22, service@simsonn.com
Hi Sam Hayes,  Where did you see the Drive Hub? Could you please share the link so I can check which product you’re referring to?
